solution_line_template: The craft store made {total_sales} / {fabric_denominator} = <<{total_sales}/{fabric_denominator}={fabric_sales}>>{fabric_sales} sales in the fabric section.
It made {total_sales} / {jewelry_denominator} = <<{total_sales}/{jewelry_denominator}={jewelry_sales}>>{jewelry_sales} sales in the jewelry section.
Thus, there were {total_sales} - {fabric_sales} - {jewelry_sales} = <<{total_sales}-{fabric_sales}-{jewelry_sales}={stationery_sales}>>{stationery_sales} sales in the stationery section.
